automations.name: Voice API Resilient
automations.description: Multi-AI voice response with Grok→Gemini→Claude→Atlas fallback
automations.benefit_en: 99.9% uptime guarantee with automatic provider failover in <500ms. Zero downtime during provider outages.
automations.benefit_fr: Garantie de disponibilite 99.9% avec basculement automatique <500ms. Zero interruption lors de pannes fournisseur.
automations.semantic_description: Mission-critical real-time conversational AI system implementing multi-provider fallback chain. Handles provider outages transparently while maintaining sub-second latency for voice interactions.
automations.business_outcome: Eliminate voice service interruptions, reduce support costs by 40%, increase customer satisfaction scores
automations.marketing_science: Service reliability as trust driver, uptime as competitive differentiator

automations.name: Grok Voice Realtime
automations.benefit_en: Ultra-low latency voice streaming with sub-100ms response. Native WebSocket support for seamless browser integration.
automations.benefit_fr: Streaming voix ultra-faible latence avec reponse sub-100ms. Support WebSocket natif pour integration navigateur transparente.
automations.semantic_description: High-performance WebSocket server enabling real-time bidirectional audio streaming. Optimized for voice-first applications requiring instant response.
automations.business_outcome: 60% cost reduction vs market alternatives, real-time voice interactions
automations.marketing_science: Latency as user experience, real-time as engagement driver

automations.name: Voice Telephony Bridge
automations.description: Twilio PSTN ↔ Grok WebSocket bridge with 11 function tools
automations.benefit_en: Complete phone system automation with competitive per-minute pricing. 11 built-in function tools for booking, payments, transfers.
automations.benefit_fr: Automatisation telephonique complete avec tarification minute competitive. 11 outils fonction integres pour reservations, paiements, transferts.
automations.semantic_description: Enterprise-grade PSTN to AI bridge connecting traditional phone lines to Grok voice AI. Includes BANT qualification, booking, payment processing, and human handoff capabilities.
automations.business_outcome: Replace IVR systems, automate 70% of inbound calls, reduce call center costs by 50%
automations.marketing_science: BANT qualification, call automation as cost lever, 24/7 availability as value prop

automations.name: Voice Persona Injector
automations.description: 38 SOTA personas with marketing science frameworks
automations.benefit_en: Industry-specific AI personalities with BANT, PAS, CIALDINI, AIDA, LAER frameworks. 100% translations in 5 languages.
automations.benefit_fr: Personnalites IA specifiques par secteur avec frameworks BANT, PAS, CIALDINI, AIDA, LAER. 100% traductions en 5 langues.
automations.semantic_description: SOTA persona engineering system providing 38 industry-specific AI personalities with complete SOTA structure: personality_traits, background, tone_guidelines, forbidden_behaviors, example_dialogues. Multi-tenant ready with GPM override for churn rescue.
automations.business_outcome: 40% improvement in response quality, industry-specific compliance, Moroccan market advantage with Darija
automations.marketing_science: BANT scoring, PAS framework, CIALDINI principles, AIDA funnel, LAER objection handling

automations.name: Voice Widget Core
automations.description: Browser-based voice assistant using Web Speech API ($0)
automations.benefit_en: Zero-cost voice assistant using native browser APIs. Drop-in integration with 2 lines of code.
automations.benefit_fr: Assistant vocal cout zero utilisant APIs navigateur natives. Integration instantanee avec 2 lignes de code.
automations.semantic_description: Lightweight browser-based voice assistant leveraging Web Speech API for transcription and synthesis. Zero infrastructure cost, instant deployment for any website.
automations.business_outcome: Trial-to-paid conversion, website conversion optimization, upsell to telephony
automations.marketing_science: 14-day trial conversion funnel, PLG (Product-Led Growth), low-friction onboarding

automations.name: Voice Widget Templates
automations.description: Industry-specific widget presets for rapid deployment
automations.benefit_en: Pre-configured voice widgets for 20+ industries. 5-minute deployment with industry-specific prompts.
automations.benefit_fr: Widgets vocaux pre-configures pour 20+ secteurs. Deploiement en 5 minutes avec prompts specifiques au secteur.
automations.semantic_description: Library of production-ready voice widget configurations tailored for specific industries including dental, real estate, restaurants, and ecommerce.
automations.business_outcome: Reduce onboarding time from days to minutes, increase client activation rate
automations.marketing_science: Time-to-value optimization, industry-specific templates as trust signals

automations.name: HubSpot B2B CRM
automations.description: Full CRUD HubSpot CRM integration for voice agents
automations.benefit_en: Automatic CRM sync during voice calls. Create contacts, deals, notes in real-time.
automations.benefit_fr: Synchronisation CRM automatique pendant les appels. Creation contacts, deals, notes en temps reel.
automations.semantic_description: Enterprise CRM integration enabling voice agents to create, read, update HubSpot records during conversations. Automatic lead capture and deal pipeline management.
automations.business_outcome: Eliminate manual data entry, 100% lead capture, sales pipeline visibility
automations.marketing_science: Lead lifecycle management, sales funnel optimization, pipeline velocity

automations.name: Voice E-commerce Tools
automations.description: Shopify + Klaviyo integration for voice commerce
automations.benefit_en: Voice-enabled order status, stock checks, and customer profile lookups. Real-time inventory and order management.
automations.benefit_fr: Statut commande, verification stock et profils clients par voix. Gestion inventaire et commandes temps reel.
automations.semantic_description: E-commerce voice integration connecting Shopify and Klaviyo to enable order tracking, inventory queries, and customer segmentation during voice interactions.
automations.business_outcome: Reduce WISMO calls by 60%, increase repeat purchases, personalized voice experience
automations.marketing_science: Customer segmentation, RFM analysis, WISMO automation, repeat purchase optimization

automations.name: Voice Quality Sensor
automations.description: Real-time voice API health and latency monitoring
automations.benefit_en: Proactive alerting on API degradation. P50/P99 latency tracking across all providers.
automations.benefit_fr: Alertes proactives sur degradation API. Suivi latence P50/P99 sur tous les fournisseurs.
automations.semantic_description: Observability sensor monitoring voice API health metrics including latency percentiles, error rates, and provider availability. Triggers alerts before customer impact.
automations.business_outcome: Reduce MTTR by 70%, proactive incident detection, SLA compliance
automations.marketing_science: SLA as trust driver, proactive monitoring as competitive advantage

automations.name: Cost Tracking Sensor
automations.description: API cost monitoring and burn rate analysis
automations.benefit_en: Real-time API spend tracking across Grok, Gemini, Twilio. Budget alerts and cost optimization recommendations.
automations.benefit_fr: Suivi depenses API temps reel Grok, Gemini, Twilio. Alertes budget et recommandations optimisation couts.
automations.semantic_description: Financial observability sensor tracking API consumption costs across all integrated providers. Provides burn rate analysis, budget forecasting, and cost anomaly detection.
automations.business_outcome: Prevent cost overruns, optimize provider selection, accurate client billing
automations.marketing_science: Cost transparency as trust driver, ROI tracking, budget predictability

automations.name: Lead Velocity Sensor
automations.description: Lead qualification funnel metrics and conversion tracking
automations.benefit_en: Track BANT score distribution, qualification rate, and time-to-qualification across personas.
automations.benefit_fr: Suivi distribution scores BANT, taux qualification et temps-de-qualification par persona.
automations.semantic_description: Sales performance sensor measuring lead qualification velocity through the voice funnel. Tracks BANT scores, conversion rates, and identifies bottlenecks in the qualification process.
automations.business_outcome: Increase qualified lead rate by 35%, optimize persona performance, identify training needs
automations.marketing_science: BANT scoring analytics, conversion funnel optimization, lead velocity metrics

automations.name: Retention Sensor
automations.description: Client retention and churn prediction metrics
automations.benefit_en: Early churn detection with GPM (Global Pressure Matrix). Trigger retention workflows before client loss.
automations.benefit_fr: Detection precoce du churn avec GPM (Matrice Pression Globale). Declenchement workflows retention avant perte client.
automations.semantic_description: Customer success sensor monitoring client health indicators and predicting churn risk. Integrates with GPM override system to trigger retention interventions.
automations.business_outcome: Reduce churn by 25%, increase LTV, proactive customer success
automations.marketing_science: Churn prediction models, customer health scoring, LTV optimization, retention marketing

personas.description_fr: Personnalite IA et ingenierie de prompts
